summary: RBS type definition files in the sig/ directory are not included in the released Ruby gem, causing Steep type checking to fail with an UnknownLibraryError when users try to use the temporalio gem.
userImpact: Users cannot perform type checking with Steep on projects using the temporalio gem, limiting IDE support and catching type errors at development time.
rootCause: The sig/ directory containing RBS type definition files is not included in the released gem package specification.
resolutionDetails: The RBS files were added to the gem packaging to be included in released versions.
keyQuote: Cannot find type definitions for library: temporalio ([nil]) (RBS::EnvironmentLoader::UnknownLibraryError)
